item.title: Streaming Ratings: ‘Untamed’ Debuts at No. 1, ‘Kpop Demon Hunters’ Hits High
item.description: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ and ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ return to the Nielsen charts with new seasons.

item.title: How ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ Used a Murder Mystery to Pay Homage to Shatner, Roddenberry and the Original Series: ‘We Didn’t Have Any Adult Supervision’
item.description: From sweeping fairytale epics to horror-slashers to the franchise’s first musical episode, “Star Trek: Strange New Worlds” is no stranger to pushing genre boundaries and challenging “Trek” convention.

item.title: How ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ Used a Murder Mystery to Pay Homage to Shatner, Roddenberry and the Original Series: ‘We Didn’t Have Any Adult Supervision’
item.description: From sweeping fairytale epics to horror-slashers to the franchise’s first musical episode, “Star Trek: Strange New Worlds” is no stranger to pushing genre boundaries and challenging “Trek” convention.

item.title: ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ Delights Comic-Con With Upcoming Episode, Teases All-Puppet Installment
item.description: “We think of you all the time when we are in the writers room and we always talk about what would the fans want and love,” exec producer Akiva Goldsman told supporters in Hall H.
